```{r import-libraries, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(plotly)
library(readxl)
```

```{r import-data, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
spotify_data <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hotz1/JSC370-HW5/main/spotify_data_full.csv")
# happiness_index <- read_xls("DataForFigure2.1WHR2021C2.xls")
```

```{r}
countries <- table(spotify_data$Country)
countries <- countries / 200
knitr::kable(countries, caption = "Number of Weeks of Data Per Country") %>%
  kableExtra::scroll_box(height = '800px')
```
